title: MSBuild templates readme broken
body:
### Context
https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Build.Templates#readme-body-tab

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/374a0c4f-1fdc-4bbc-88f1-e1c83ee6b25d)


It seems like the markup for table is not following what nuget.org supports
